landingPage.title: Spray_info
landingPage.subTitle: Your Digital Hub 3.0
landingPage.description: Supporting your ideas, fueling your inspiration, realizing your digital projects: our daily commitment.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Spray_Info is an institution combining academic excellence, technical expertise, and strategic support. It includes a private university, a training center, a consulting firm, and a digital service hub.

objectives.title: Our Objectives
objectives.description: Explore our strategic objectives and vision for technology education.

points.title: Training & Integration
points.description: Facilitate learning of technologies (IT, robotics, cybersecurity) and support students towards professional life.

points.title: Spray_X University
points.description: Degree programs in Software Engineering and Network Administration with 'Intelligence 3.0' pedagogy.

points.title: Spray_idea
points.description: Strategic consulting and support for individuals and companies in their digital transformation.

points.title: TechnoSupport
points.description: Digital services: websites, ERP, cybersecurity. Involvement of interns in real projects.

missions.title: Our Missions
missions.description: Discover our commitments to train tomorrow's talents and support digital transformation.
points: Train tomorrow’s talents through the Spray_X university in Software Engineering and Systems & Network Administration.
Make technology accessible to everyone, regardless of level or gender.
Provide strategic support through Spray_idea for companies and individuals.
Address companies' digital needs via TechnoSupport with professional services and real-world projects.

history.title: Our History
history.description: Discover the journey of Spray_Info from its foundation to its strategic expansion.

timeline.event: Founded by three engineers from ENI Tuléar in Fianarantsoa, starting with only two students in a modest house.
Acquired a facility capable of hosting over 100 students, with improved equipment.
Focused on IT training for university students.
Diversified training offerings in communication, personal development, marketing, and leadership.
Launched Spray_idea, a consulting firm supporting companies and individuals.
Created TechnoSupport, a digital service branch offering IT services to businesses.
Launched the private university Spray_X with two majors: Software Engineering and System & Network Administration.

service.title: Our Services
service.description: Excellence & Innovation <1/> By joining the digital field, discover a world of opportunities. Our specialized training programs guide you towards professional excellence.

types.title: Spray_learn
types.description: Facilitate technology learning for young enthusiasts, especially in IT, robotics, cybersecurity, and intelligent systems. Support university students in improving their technical skills and preparing for professional life.
types.subTitle: Training and professional integration

types.title: Spray_x
types.description: Offer high-level degree programs in Software Engineering and System & Network Administration. Implement innovative pedagogy focused on applied intelligence: 'Intelligence, version 3.0'. Prepare competitive, creative, and entrepreneurial profiles able to thrive in a dynamic digital environment.
types.subTitle: Private university

types.title: Spray_idea
types.description: Help companies succeed in their digital transformation. Provide personalized support in digital strategy, communication, leadership, and internal organization. Bring field expertise to improve productivity and impact of partner organizations.
types.subTitle: Consulting firm

types.title: Digital Solution
types.description: Provide professional technology services: website creation, CRM/ERP deployment, cybersecurity, maintenance, etc. Offer interns and trainers the opportunity to work on real projects in collaboration with companies.
types.subTitle: Digital Service Provider

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the passionate experts driving Spray_Info forward. Our team combines technical, educational, and strategic skills to offer you the best.

registration.title: Are you interested?
registration.description: Join us now and bring your digital ambitions to life!

partner.title: Our Partners
partner.description: Discover the companies and organizations that trust us and collaborate with us to create innovative solutions.

becomePartner.title: Become a partner!
becomePartner.description: Join our innovation network and benefit from exclusive opportunities to grow your business. Together, let's create the future of digital!
